document.full_text: rare candid footage of endangered sumatran tigers in the wild was shot using motion-sensing cameras, stationed for months in a stretch of indonesian forest that may be cleared by major paper companies.
document.title: the lede: cameras capture endangered tigers in sumatra forest
lines_and_colors: rare candid footage of endangered sumatran tigers in the wild was shot using motion-sensing cameras, stationed for months in a stretch of indonesian forest that may be cleared by major paper companies.
